sentences: Me elame universumi osas, mida me nimetame Maaks.
Universumis on palju m√ºsteeriume, mis ootavad lahendamist.
context: The word 'universum' in Estonian refers to the universe, which is the vast expanse of time, space, and matter that encompasses all existence, including planets, stars, galaxies, and other forms of energy and matter. It is commonly used in scientific and philosophical contexts to describe the entirety of existence.
